tokyoNight.name: Tokyo Night
tokyoNight.description: Sweet and sour cocktail made with passion fruit puree, sprite, sweet cherry syrup and Japanese gin.

soprano.name: Soprano
soprano.description: Sweet cocktail made with espresso, Baileys and almond liqueur.

supernovaMartini.name: Supernova Martini
supernovaMartini.description: Sour cocktail made with passion fruit puree, vanilla vodka, lime juice with prosecco addition.

onyxPeach.name: Onyx Peach
onyxPeach.description: Sweet cocktail made with rum, peach puree, pineapple juice and peach liqueur.

eclipse.name: Eclipse
eclipse.description: Sour cocktail made with tequila, orange juice, grenadine and mint.

siriusAAndB.name: Sirius A&B
siriusAAndB.description: Two cocktails in one position. First is made with vodka infused by red tea, lemon sour, melon liqueur.

aperol.name: Aperol
aperol.description: Sweet and bitter classic drink made with Aperol, sparkling water and prosecco.

boulevardier.name: Boulevardier
boulevardier.description: Strong bitter cocktail made with bourbon, Martini Rosso and Campari.

cubaLibre.name: Cuba Libre
cubaLibre.description: Sweet and sour cocktail made with rum, mint, lime juice and coke.

daiquiri.name: Daiquiri
daiquiri.description: Sour cocktail made with rum, lime juice and triple sec.

godFather.name: God Father
godFather.description: Sweet strong cocktail made with bourbon and almond liqueur.

oldFashioned.name: Old Fashioned
oldFashioned.description: Sweet strong cocktail made with bourbon, cane sugar and Angostura.

longIsland.name: Long Island
longIsland.description: Sweet and sour cocktail made with gin, vodka, rum, tequila, triple sec, lemon juice and coke.

manhattan.name: Manhattan
manhattan.description: Bitter cocktail made with bourbon, Martini Rosso and Angostura.

margarita.name: Margarita
margarita.description: Sour cocktail made with tequila, triple sec and lime juice.

mojito.name: Mojito
mojito.description: Sour cocktail made with rum, lime juice, mint and sprite.

negroni.name: Negroni
negroni.description: Bitter cocktail made with gin, Campari and Martini Rosso.

tomCollins.name: Tom Collins
tomCollins.description: Sour cocktail made with gin, cane sugar, lemon juice and sparkling water.

bumblebee.name: Bumblebee
bumblebee.description: Sweet and bitter mocktail made with espresso, orange juice and vanilla syrup.

eleanora.name: Eleanora
eleanora.description: Sweet tropical mocktail made with pineapple and apple juice, passion fruit puree and melon syrup.

citrusBlossom.name: Citrus Blossom
citrusBlossom.description: Sour mocktail made with orange, lemon and lime juice, vanilla and elderflower syrup.

orion.name: Orion
orion.description: Sweet and sour cocktail made with passion fruit puree, sprite and cherry syrup.

stargaze.name: Stargaze
stargaze.description: Sour mocktail made with blueberry puree, pineapple and lime juice, vanilla and melon syrup.

shishaPremium.name: Shisha Premium
shishaPremium.description: Choose your nicotine strength 1–7 and enjoy different flavours.

shishaCigarro.name: Shisha Cigarro
shishaCigarro.description: High quality cigar leaf (no aromatic). Good, clear and mixed.

shishaParfume.name: Shisha Parfume
shishaParfume.description: New wave in hookah industry. Rich, flavourfull, different.
